content: I didn’t read the source article for this, but this may refer to the time allotted for this particular study. Grant funded research budgets personnel on percentage of work time/ hours per week/ or calendar months. If these research assistants were budgeted on a grant at 10%, they should only allocate 10% of their work time on this research study, because the other 90% of their time needs to be allocated elsewhere. This holds true in the US, too.
